bibl.title: Ray Raymond v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p:
Territory of Washington,
County of Spokane} ss

Territory of Washington
Plaintiff
vs.
Ray Raymond
Defendant}
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington in and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory.
TO THE SHERIFF OF Spokane COUNTY GREETING:
IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon Arthur Misner

to be and appear before the District Court House, in Spokane Falls, on the forthwith day of May A.D. 1887 at o'clock M. to here give evidence in the above entitled cause on part of said Defendant there to remain until discharged. WITNESS the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed this 28th day of May A.D. 1887

figure.p: DISTRICT COURT WASHINGTON TERRITORY SPOKANE COUNTY FOURTH JUD. DISTRICT

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to A. Murner within named in said county on this 28th day of May A.D. 1887
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County in said Territory.
Returned and filed this 28th day of May A.D. 1887
SHERIFF'S FEES Serving 1 names at .40 .40 Mileage 2 miles at .10 .20 Total, - - - - - - $.60
